mapper.insert: insert into key_word (id, master_id, group_space, group_final, type_space, type_final, inner_space, inner_final, upper_key, lower_key, modify_attack, delete_attack, query_attack, count_key, after_add, after_delete, modify_provision, modify_playing, truncate_playing, modify_nickname, using_image, cancel_message, receive_request, ensure_request, ensure_playing, commit_false, lack_provision, limit_provision, game_stopped, undo_message ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{masterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupFinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeFinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerSpace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{innerFinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upperKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lowerKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryAttack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{afterAdd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{afterDelete,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{modifyProvision,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{modifyPlaying,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{truncatePlaying,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{modifyNickname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{usingImage,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cancelMessage,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{receiveRequest,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ensureRequest,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ensurePlaying,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{commitFalse,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lackProvision,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{limitProvision,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gameStopped,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{undoMessage,jdbcType=CHAR} )
